plot: A lady is rescued from a villain by a heroic young man, who then takes her for a spin in his Oldsmobile.
title: In My Merry Oldsmobile
plot_es: A lady is rescued from a villain by a heroic young man, who then takes her for a spin in his Oldsmobile.
plot_en: A lady is rescued from a villain by a heroic young man, who then takes her for a spin in his Oldsmobile.
